Verses: 1 appozhudhu Janangal Yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaagaasai Azhaiththu, Avanai Erusalemile Avan Thagappan Sthaanaththile Raajaavaakkinaargal.
2 yovaagaas Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththumoondru Vayadhaayirundhu, Moondrumaadham Erusalemil Arasaandaan.
3 avan Erusalemil Arasaalaadhapadikku Egipthin Raajaa Avanaith Thallivittu, Dhesaththinmel Nooru Thaalandhu Velliyum Oru Thaalandhu Ponnumaana Thandaththai Sumaththi,

4 avanudaiya Annanaagiya Eliyaakkeemai Yoodhaavinmelum Erusaleminmelum Raajaavaakki, Avan Perai Yoyaakkeem Endru Maatrinaan; Avan Thambiyaagiya Yovaagaasai Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Neko Egipthirkuk Konduponaan.
5 yoyaakkeem Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Padhinoruvarusham Erusalemil Arasaandu, Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.
6 avanukku Virodhamaaga Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Vandhu, Avanai Baabilonukkuk Kondupoga Irandu Vengala Sangiliyaal Avanaik Kattinaan.
7 karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Panimuttugalilum Silavatrai Nebugaadhnechchaar Baabilonukkuk Kondupoi, Avargalai Baabilonilulla, Thannudaiya Kovilile Vaiththaan.

8 yoyaakkeemudaiya Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhadhum, Avanidaththile Kandupidikkappattadhumaana Avanudaiya Aruvaruppugalum, Isravel Yoodhaa Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu; Avan Sthaanaththil Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeen Raajaavaanaan.
9 yoyaakkeen Raajaavaagirapodhu Ettu Vayadhaayirundhu, Moondru Maadhamum Paththu Naalum Erusalemil Arasaandu, Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.

10 maruvarushaththin Aarambaththile Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Raajaa Avanaiyum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Dhivviyamaana Panimuttugalaiyum Baabilonukkuk Konduvarappanni, Avan Siriyathagappanaagiya Sidhekkiyaavai Yoodhaavinmelum Erusaleminmelum Raajaavaakkinaan.
11 sidhekkiyaa Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththoru Vayadhaayirundhu, Padhinoruvarusham Erusalemil Arasaandu,
12 than Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seyd
